title: Kita e.: Diamond Dust Drops (Diamond Daydreams)
synopsis: If a couple sees the diamond dust together, then they will certainly find eternal happiness. Or so it is said. This is a drama about the romances, friendships and conflicts of six girls from Hokkaido and how the diamond dust affects them and eventually links them together in the search for happiness.
related_anime: ['Kita e: Pure Session', 'Kita e.: Diamond Dust Drops Special']
